item.title: Wires #1: Getting Started - Requirements and Thoughts
item.description: Let’s create an insightful, fun and outstanding project. On this long journey of creating such a thing, I will share ups and downs, thoughts and progress.

item.title: Getting into hacking [Hacking Challenges]: Can you hack it?
item.description: This is my attempt to solve the “Can you hack it?” Challenge. I will share the solutions and how to achieve thme, without spoiling the secrets.

item.title: Use you home modem when electricity is down !
item.description: In the palce I live in, electricity goes off everyday for 2 hours and I really need the internet connectoin that time, because you know it’s 2023, Internet is a like water, no one can live without it.

item.title: How to update discord on archlinux ?
item.description: I hate discord updates!, they do lots of updates which prevents discord desktop from launching. Bad for me that I use Archlinux, as discord ships thier updates as .deb.

item.title: Linux And Other Cool Things
item.description: Life is a long journey of learning and experience, once you stop learning you die!, also sharing is caring. That’s why I am sharing this thing :D

item.title: Askfm Reverse Engineering: Getting Threads Back!
item.description: So you heared it. Askfm Reverse Engineering! to get back the threads to the web version by creating a web extension that calls the mobile api to show the data and more.

item.title: Git for hackers
item.description: A practical guide for git with real life scenarios which can make your git experience better.

item.title: How email tracking works ?
item.description: Have you ever wondered how could someone knows if you read their email or not ?

item.title: My Way For Problem solving!
item.description: To be good at something, it requires you to practice a lot. Problem-solving isn’t any different - it just requires a bit more creativity, patience, and probably a Math degree. (just kidding!).

item.title: Setup old android tablet for development
item.description: Getting StartedBefore Starting, it’s a good idea to install a Custom ROM for your old device just to get the best out of it. Head to XDA and search for your device. But why you might ask ? The installed custom ROM would bring you newer Android version + new kernel version. (not always) Root access (more control in general). In my case, I am using SM-T585 which came with Android 8.
